Queries.Name: Warehouses
Queries.Sql: SELECT whs_ID, whs_Code, whs_Name, whs_Address, whs_Active FROM Warehouses WHERE whs_Active = 1

Queries.Name: StockOwners
Queries.Sql: SELECT own_ID, own_Code, own_Name, own_Active FROM StockOwners WHERE own_Active = 1

Queries.Name: Customers
Queries.Sql: SELECT cus_ID, cus_Code, cus_Name, cus_Email, cus_Phone, cus_Address, cus_Active, cus_CreatedDate FROM Customers WHERE cus_Active = 1

Queries.Name: Items
Queries.Sql: SELECT prd_ID, prd_Code, prd_Name, prd_Description, prd_UnitPrice, prd_Active FROM Products WHERE prd_Active = 1

Queries.Name: StockItems
Queries.Sql: SELECT p.prd_ID, p.prd_Code, p.prd_Barcode, p.prd_Weight, p.prd_Volume, COALESCE(SUM(s.stc_Quantity), 0) AS prd_StockLevel FROM Products p LEFT JOIN Stock s ON p.prd_ID = s.stc_ProductID WHERE p.prd_Active = 1 GROUP BY p.prd_ID, p.prd_Code, p.prd_Barcode, p.prd_Weight, p.prd_Volume

Queries.Name: Inventory
Queries.Sql: SELECT stc_ID, stc_SSCC, stc_ProductID, stc_WarehouseID, stc_Quantity, stc_Location, stc_EntryDate AS SSCCEntryDate, stc_ExpiryDate FROM Stock WHERE stc_Quantity > 0

Queries.Name: InventoryMovement
Queries.Sql: SELECT rct_ID, rct_Code, rct_Type, rct_ProductID, rct_WarehouseID, rct_Quantity, rct_InputDate, rct_Reference FROM Receipts WHERE rct_InputDate >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
